questions.question: How do I generate my first video?
questions.answer: Select a template, fill in the parameters, and click the 'Generate Video' button. Video generation usually takes 1-3 minutes.

questions.question: How are credits calculated?
questions.answer: Standard quality videos consume 20 credits, high quality videos consume 100 credits. You can get credits through subscription or individual purchase.

questions.question: What should I do if video generation fails?
questions.answer: If video generation fails, credits will be automatically refunded. Please check your network connection and retry, or contact customer support.
